example.text: She highlighted the fact that this leaves the vast majority of new and underserved farmers at the whims of the climate and the market. As a result, many small farmers, especially minority farmers, are losing their farms.

This week, I had the pleasure of meeting with my friend and Mayor of Dallas Eric Johnson. We are both proud former HD-100 reps who are excited to collaborate and bring change to the people of Dallas at the local, state and federal levels.

Your support is paramount in securing the investments and federal dollars we need to better our community. Together, with the on-going support of passionate individuals such as yourself, we bring tangible, meaningful change to our district.
Mr. Chair, it must be nice to perch yourself upon privilege. The vast majority of my colleagues across the aisle have never had to have ``the talk.''

Click or tap below to watch: Congresswoman Crockett met with Hanène Tajouri Bessassi, the Ambassador of Tunisia to the United States. Last century, the United States was the first major power to recognize Tunisian independence.
